subject: WELCOME TO WORLD DEBT RECOVE
body:
WELCOME TO WORLD DEBT RECOVERY COMMITTEE
WORLD DEBT RECOVERY COMMITTEE (WDRC)
Address:541 Jeffcoco Avenue, Suite 204,
Abuja Nigeria
 
With Due Respect Sir
 
I am Mrs Mary Beth Leonard, The Former U.S Ambassador to Nigeria,the current Director of World
Debt Recovery committee (WDRC).in conjunction with Nigeria's new president (Bola Ahmed Tinubu)
and West Africa Fund Monitoring Unit (WAFMU)
 
 
With reference to your entitlement fund and inline with the CHANGE OF BENEFICARY'S APPLICATION,
signed by Mrs. Glenda F. Ward with your purported authorization.This issue has been carefully examined and we have declined Mrs. Ward's application as the application lacks regular signature. But Did you ever instruct Mrs Glenda F. Ward to claim your fund worth US$10.000.000? Below is the bank account information provided by Mrs Glenda F. Ward saying that you authorized her to claim your fund that you are terminally ill.
 
Bank Name: Bank of America
Account Name:: Glenda F. Ward
ACCT NO: 586025513245
Routing No: 111000025
Bank Address 9711 Bissonnet St. Houston, Tx 77036
 
If you had not authorized the change of your bank account in respect to your outstanding
entitlement Payment, therefore notify me immediately as the notification / declaration was
supported with a sworn affidavit from the high court. and signed by Mrs. Glenda Ward who claim and stated in the sworn declaration that you authorized her to claim the said fund on your behalf to a different bank account in the U.S.A as stated above because you were terminally ill and the
 
Doctor who is incharge of your case stated that you will not stay more than one Month before
passing away.This development has caused lots of discrepancies in your payment file that is why we had to suspend your payment and prompt you to contact you directly before re-validating your payment.
 
You can be rest assured that I will do everything within my capacity to successfully actualize
the quick transfer of your fund to any of your nominated bank accounts.
 
Kindly get back to me as soon as possible so that I will direct you on what to do.
Sincerely Yours
Mary Beth Leonard,The Former
U.S Ambassador to Nigeria

subject: Re:   WELCOME TO WORLD DEBT RECOVE
body:
Dear Mary Beth,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the World Debt Recovery Committee. I appreciate your concern and willingness to assist with my fund. However, I have a few questions before we proceed.

Firstly, could you please provide more information about the specific fund that you are referring to? I want to make sure that we are on the same page and that I fully understand the situation.

Secondly, you mentioned Mrs. Glenda F. Ward claiming that she has authorization from me to change my bank account details. I must clarify that I have never authorized anyone, including Mrs. Ward, to make any changes or claim funds on my behalf. Could you please explain how this misunderstanding occurred?

Lastly, what steps do you suggest I take in order to resolve this issue and ensure the prompt transfer of my funds? I want to make sure that everything is done correctly and securely.

I look forward to your response and appreciate your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Tamara
